thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Euroflorist Belgique / België | Avis - Euroflorist Belgique / België | www.euroflorist.be | 2 sur 228
thread.title: Tony Ghanem
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par Tony Ghanem

author: Tony Ghanem
title: Tony Ghanem
text:
The site was easy to use... I browsed the site from Lebanon to deliver to Belgium...
the collection of bouquet was unique and every detail was included on the command page... like the card, the chocolate box, choosing the size of the bouquet and all.... even where to leave it in case the person is not home... i recommended they deliver at a specific time and they did!! AWESOME service ... definitely a 10 over 10 !!!
